element.name: Boon of Attunement
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your attunement slots increase by 1.

element.name: Boon of Beasts
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You are permanently under the effect of speak with animals, and can cast animal friendship at will without any components or expending a spell slot. You lose this effect for 24 hours if you kill a beast.

element.name: Boon of Bond
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You and another willing creature become permanently bonded together by a magical connection. Any damage taken or healing done to either creature is split between the two creatures. Either creature can transfer their hit points to the other creature by touching them as an action if the other creature has less hit points than they do (up to an amount that would equalize their hit points).

element.name: Boon of Carnage
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: When you kill a creature with a weapon attack, you gain 5 temporary hit points and an additional action which can only be used to take the attack action (one weapon attack only) this additional action lasts until the end of your turn. Once you gain this bonus, you cannot gain it again until the start of your next turn.

element.name: Boon of Celestial Ascension
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your creature type becomes Celestial. You gain resistance to radiant damage, and sprout angelic wings that grant you a flying speed of 30 feet. If you already have resistance to radiant damage, you gain immunity to radiant damage.

element.name: Resist Radiant
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You have resistance to radiant damage.

element.name: Boon of Crafting
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You gain advantage on all crafting checks or ability checks made with artisan tools.

element.name: Boon of Divine Blessing
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You are permanently under the effect of the bless spell.

element.name: Boon of Divine Guidance
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You are permanently under the effect of the guidance spell. The spell does not end when you make an ability check.

element.name: Boon of Draconic Inheritance (Acid)
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your creature type becomes dragon. You gain resistance to one of the following damage types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison damage (selected by the creature giving you the boon), and sprout draconic wings that grant you a flying speed of 30 feet.

element.name: Boon of Demonic Transformation
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your creature type becomes fiend (demon). You gain resistance to fire and lightning damage. You sprout a demonic tail that can be used as a natural weapon, dealing 1d6 piercing damage and 1d6 poison damage.
If you already have resistance to fire or lightning or damage, you gain immunity to the damage type.

element.name: Resist Lightning
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You have resistance to lightning damage.

element.name: Boon of Earth
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You gain resistance to poison damage and gain a tremorsense of 30 feet. You can cast become stone at will without any components or expending a spell slot.
If you are already resistant to poison damage, you gain immunity to poison damage.

element.name: Resist Poison
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You have resistance to poison damage.

element.name: Boon of Everlasting Magic
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: The duration of all your spells with a duration is doubled.

element.name: Boon of Fire
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You gain resistance to fire damage and no longer suffer the effects of hot environments. You can cast become fire at will without any components or expending a spell slot.
If you already have resistance to fire damage, you gain immunity to fire damage.

element.name: Boon of Freezing Water
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You gain resistance to cold damage and no longer suffer the effects of cold environments. You can cast become water at will without any components or expending a spell slot.
If you already have resistance to cold damage, you gain immunity to cold damage.

element.name: Resist Cold
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

element.name: Boon of Illusions
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You can cast silent image at will without expending a spell slot. Additionally, you can see through all illusions, seeing them for what they are.

element.name: Boon of Infernal Damnation
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your creature type becomes fiend (devil). You gain resistance to fire and poison damage. You sprout infernal horns.
f you already have resistance to fire or poison damage, they gain immunity to the damage type.

element.name: Boon of The Fairy
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: You become one size smaller. You can cast faerie fire at will without any components or expending a spell slot. You gain butterfly wings that grant you a flying speed of 30 feet, but leave behind an ephemeral trail of glittering dust when you fly that lasts one round, giving you disadvantage on stealth checks when on any turn you use your flying speed.

element.name: Boon of The Giant
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: Your size increases to Large (if smaller than Large), and the damage of your melee weapon attacks increase by 1d4.

element.name: Boon of Ghostly Passage
element.source: Kibbles' Compendium of Legends and Legacies

description.p: As a bonus action, you can become ethereal until the start of your next turn. While ethereal, you can pass through creatures and objects without expending additional movement, but cannot end your turn inside an occupied space. You have resistance to all damage besides force and psychic damage. If you occupy the same spot as a solid object or creature when this effect ends, you are immediately shunted to the nearest unoccupied space that you can occupy and take force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved. Once you use this ability, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.
